projects.title: Sovereign Syndicate
projects.summary: A Disco Elysium-inspired Victorian steampunk RPG. Hired as Lead Writer, promoted to Narrative Director after securing Canada Media Fund grant. Responsible for branching dialogue across four playable characters, questlines, and overall narrative cohesion.
highlights: Drafted story outline with Game Producer and Creative Director
Period-specific research for Victorian London setting
Created development documents for NPCs, locations, and quests
Vetted hiring and managed junior writers
Tested and integrated dialogue within Unity

projects.title: Studio Delirium
projects.summary: As the existing Narrative Director at Crimson Herring, introduced to this project by our game producer. Responsible for narrative design, quest architecture, and managing junior writers while building the playable golden path.
highlights: Improved existing Game Design Documents with Game Director
Met with real industry members who inspired NPCs
Planned quests, inventory items, and interactions
Wrote branching dialogue and reviewed junior writer deliveries
Built first-pass playable 'Golden Path' in Unity
